CustomField.description: Field from Product to use for product value. For non-entitlement evaluations, the following CPQ attributes are valid: 'Product_Name', 'Start_Date', 'End_Date', 'Quantity', 'Discount', 'Unit_Price', 'List_Price', 'Sub_Total_Price', and 'Total_Price' in addition to any QuoteLineItem Field API names in the event that CPQ is custom stamping said fields. For entitlement evaluations, any Contract_Entitlement__c Field API names are supported.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Field from Product to use for product value. For non-entitlement evaluations, the following CPQ attributes are valid: 'Product_Name', 'Start_Date', 'End_Date', 'Quantity', 'Discount', 'Unit_Price', 'List_Price', 'Sub_Total_Price', and 'Total_Price' in addition to any QuoteLineItem Field API names in the event that CPQ is custom stamping said fields. For entitlement evaluations, any Contract_Entitlement__c Field API names are supported.
CustomField.label: Product Field
